Copy of letter from British Secretary, Peace Conferonce(Circulated for information with reference to, C .P.991)^2, Whitehall Gardens, London, g.W. 1.9th April, 1920.Your ptc ellenciee,I am directed hy Mr. Lloyd George to inform you that your letter of March 31st, I92f?, proposing an addition to Article 5J.139.. of the Draft Treaty concerning the minorities of Armenia, has been considered by the Conference of Ambassadors and Foreign Ministers meeting in London.The Conference were reminded that Article 5 in. its present form is identical with corresponding Articles introduced into a number of other Treaties dealing with Minorities.. To accept the addition proposed by the Armenian Delegation would raise questions in regard to corresponding articles in other Treaties, in these circumstances the Conference felt that it v/ould be impossible to accede to the request of the Armenian Delegation.I have the honour to be, Your excellencies1 obedient Servant,. (3gd.) M.P.A. HAHK7FY*British Secretary,His ExcellencyM. Boghos ftubar pasha,Armenian Delegation.His Excellency,M. Aharonian,Armenian Delegation. ]A.J. 139.,f " iqN0.RITI^3 TREATY Y-TITH AHH7HIA,Copy of letter from Armenian Delegation to Sir M. Hankoy.Delegation,De L'Anncnie Integral! London.31 mars, 1920.Monsiour le Colonel,J*ai l'honneur de vous accuser reception et de vous remerciervousde 1'envoi que^avez bien voulu mo faire, de la part de K. LlcydGeorge, d'une copie du projet du traite concernant les Minorities ee $1.128, de 1'Armenia.Confornament a rotre demands de vous faire connaitre lesobservations que ce projet pourrait suggerer a la DelegationAnaeni enne, j'e lui ai aoumis le pro jet et nous avons 1'honneurfr'attirer la bienveiilante attention do la Conference sur un soulpoint de l1article V*, a la fin duquel hous croyona qu'il seraitutile d'ajouter la phrase aulvante"Cos institutions, de; meme que toutes lea autres identiques, detant etre sous la controle de l!3]Jtat."L& Delegation Araenienne, en preeentant ses rifs reraercie-ments a la Conference des Ambassadeurs, est heureuse de rendrehomaage a la hauteur d*esprit qui a preside a la redaction duprojet du traite dont il s*agit.Agreez, Monsieur, 1'assurance de notre consideration laplus distingu.ee.(Sgd.) A. AHARONIAH (Sgd.) BOGHOS HUBAB.president de la Delegation president de la Delegationdc la 5-epublique Armanienne Nationale Armenicnne.a la Conference de la paix.tlol. Sir Maurice P.A.
